# mailcow_relayhost (Resource)

Manages a relayhost / sender dependent transport configuration in mailcow. This can be used in order to use third party SMTP-Relays with better reputation such as Sweego, Lettermint or AWS SES.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "mailcow_relayhost" "relayhost" {
  hostname = "my-smtp-relay.com:2525"
  username = "my-username"
  password = "my-password"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `hostname` (String) The hostname to connect to, including port. Must be of the format {hostname}:{port}.
- `password` (String, Sensitive) The password to use for the connection
- `username` (String) The username to use for the connection

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
